name: Rockhampton: A Microbial Mystery - Boneless Rodents
name_original: Rockhampton: A Microbial Mystery - Boneless Rodents
description:
Left click to move around, 

Find materials from your surroundings, take and refine these materials to create powerful microbes. Use these microbes to complete tasks.

Known Bugs, Final bridge is a bit clunky and can gobble up your material sometimes.

Music Does not loop, in some cases.
